snippet: Rafael Nadal won his ninth French Open title Sunday and fifth in a row, defeating his longtime rival Novak Djokovic, 3-6, 7-5, 6-2, 6-4.
abstract: Rafael Nadal defeats Novak Djokovic, 3-6, 7-5, 6-2, 6-4, to win his ninth French Open men's singles title and fifth in a row; victory allows Nadal to retain the No. 1 ranking, and keeps Djokovic from joining Nadal, Roger Federer and five other men who have won all four Grand Slam singles titles.
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal won his ninth French Open title Sunday and fifth in a row, defeating his longtime rival Novak Djokovic, 3-6, 7-5, 6-2, 6-4.

headline.main: Nadal Denies Djokovic, and Defies Belief, Once Again
headline.print_headline: Nadal Denies Djokovic, and Defies Belief, Once Again
